name: The Mern
description:
Welcome to the Mern, trainee!

Your first mission will be to retrieve the missing pieces of a recently crashed ship in your vicinity.

While you are getting acquainted with your gear make sure to keep an eye out for materials and the beasts roaming around the planet.  Here are your main objectives - don't forget them!

  • Gather resources
  • Collect ship parts
  • Fend off the alien wildlife
  • Build shock coils and bombs to advance

The game is playable in its entirety through LAN multiplayer with up to four players. Lag may occur in multiplayer scenarios.
